newsitem.title: CANADA: Bre-X shares rise at open in Toronto.
newsitem.headline: Bre-X shares rise at open in Toronto.

text.p: Shares in avidly watched Bre-X Minerals Ltd traded higher on the Toronto Stock Exchange at the open on Friday in comparatively light volume, then pushed higher in active trade.
Bre-X was up 0.22 to 3.65 on turnover of about 100,000 shares in the first minute. Within five minutes, the stock was up 0.35 to 3.78 and volume topped one million shares.
Bre-X trade was stopped due to technical problems in Toronto on Thursday after trading frenetically for just more than three hours.
